/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. Cars and pedestrians add life to the scene, going about their day under the watchful eye of the towering buildings. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the background, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
